ModMetaData.name: RimFantasy - Temperature Pylons
ModMetaData.author: Sierra
ModMetaData.description:
[h1]Supported Versions:[/h1] [b]Rimworld 1.2[/b]
This mod adds 2 new magical gem pylons that radiate temperature changing aura.
Moderately powerful but costly, they are capable of supporting anywhere from a small storage room on their own, to a large facility when multiple are installed. Be careful though, the energies within the crystals are barely contained and excessive damage will produce a rather spectacular explosion.
[b]Recommended Mods:[/b] [list] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2244594116]RimTraits - Vanilla Trait Colours[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1916352291]RimTraits - Medieval Talent[/url] [*][url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2206957172]RimTraits - General Traits[/url] [/list]
[b]Mod Compatibility:[/b] [list] [*]No Specific Issues Known. [*]Built-in support for [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2365526329]Proxy Heat[/url] [*]Probably won't play well with other gem mod without a patch. [/list]
[b]Balance:[/b] This mod is perfectly balanced, as all things should be.
